
---
title: "Policy"
block_external_search_index: true
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The ``rabbitmq..Policy`` resource creates and manages policies for exchanges
and queues.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as rabbitmq from "@pulumi/rabbitmq";

const testVHost = new rabbitmq.VHost("test", {});
const guest = new rabbitmq.Permissions("guest", {
    permissions: {
        configure: ".*",
        read: ".*",
        write: ".*",
    },
    user: "guest",
    vhost: testVHost.name,
});
const testPolicy = new rabbitmq.Policy("test", {
    policy: {
        applyTo: "all",
        definition: {
            "ha-mode": "all",
        },
        pattern: ".*",
        priority: 0,
    },
    vhost: guest.vhost,
});
```

{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The vhost to create the resource in.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}


{{% choosable language python %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The name of the policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>policy</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#policypolicy">Dict[Policy<wbr>Policy]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The settings of the policy. The structure is
described below.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>vhost</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The vhost to create the resource in.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}










## Supporting Types

<h4>Policy<wbr>Policy</h4>
{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
> See the <a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/rabbitmq/types/input/#PolicyPolicy">input</a> and <a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/rabbitmq/types/output/#PolicyPolicy">output</a> API doc for this type.
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language go %}}
> See the <a href="https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/pulumi/pulumi-rabbitmq/sdk/v2/go/rabbitmq/?tab=doc#PolicyPolicyArgs">input</a> and <a href="https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/pulumi/pulumi-rabbitmq/sdk/v2/go/rabbitmq/?tab=doc#PolicyPolicyOutput">output</a> API doc for this type.
{{% /choosable %}}




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Apply<wbr>To</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Can either be "exchanges", "queues", or "all".
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Definition</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Key/value pairs of the policy definition. See the
RabbitMQ documentation for definition references and examples.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Pattern</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A pattern to match an exchange or queue name.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Priority</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The policy with the greater priority is applied first.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
